content: Starting aid DD-SA 6 ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Accessories for tool inserts > Adapters and attachments- ### FEATURES:Features Compatible with Hilti PCM and HDM core bits and socket cutters Allows for easy starting of the hole in masonry Allows the starting aid to be used for the entire lifetime of the core bit Applications Hand-held dry coring applications in masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Starting aids Technical Data | Accessory type | Starting aids ### ITEMS- 3445382 - Starting aid DD-SA 6 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Starting aid DD-SA 6/10 - 1x Core bit adapter DD-SA BT
